root.name: Street Boyz
root.description: OverviewStreet Boyz is a beat 'em up developed by Tamsoft and published by both 505 Game Street (European Release) and D3 Publisher (Japanese Release) for the PlayStation 2 platform.In Japan the game is part of the Simple 2000 series and is titled: Simple 2000 Ultimate Series Vol. 21: Kenka Joutou! Yankee Banchou.
